sense.gloss: to bark, to howl, to bay, to roar, to yelp, to yap
to howl (of the wind), to roar (of the sea)
to yell, to shout, to cry, to moan

sdata.j: ↑返事↑↓へんじ↓を↑待↑↓ま↓つアリスに↑向↑↓む↓けられたのは↑突然↑↓とつぜん↓の↑咆哮↑↓ほうこう↓。それは↑耳↑↓みみ↓を↑貫↑↓つらぬ↓かんばかりに↑鋭↑↓するど↓く、↑天↑↓てん↓に↑届↑↓とど↓かんばかりに↑大↑↓おお↓きく↑響↑↓ひび↓くものでした。
sdata.e: What Alice, waiting for a reply, was faced with was a sudden howl. It was a resounding noise, sharp as to burst her ear drums, loud as to reach unto the heavens.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑声↑↓こえ↓は↑悪霊↑↓あくりょう↓の↑突然↑↓とつぜん↓の↑咆哮↑↓ほうこう↓にかき↑消↑↓け↓される。
sdata.e: His voice was drowned out by the wraith's sudden howl.

words.gloss: to bark, to howl, to bay, to roar, to yelp, to yap
